We must stand on the side of all peoples, all cultures, the lands, and most importantly - the Mother Earth that we all inhabit. We must ensure that all of our NCCs, NCCs that will be able to meet our demands and objectives, be able to unite in such a way that can lead to a victory not only to ourselves but to the whole of humanity.""
